data.actual_result: RAM usage is rather excessive, around 700-800, sometimes 900MB
data.expected_result: It should have relitively normal RAM usage.
data.short_description: Discord Canary on Mac uses a large amount of memory after being open for a few days (700-800MB)
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Discord - Use it normally for a day or so without closing it. Sleep is fine. - After around a day, open Activity Monitor and take a look at RAM usage
